title: Survival in a Sun Stricken World
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:penumbra]]

[[module css]]
:root {
  --accentColor: #FF5512;
  --header-title: "DAYBREAK";
  --header-subtitle: "SOL'S CRUEL PLANET";
  --lgurl: url("https://scp-wiki.wdfiles.com/local--files/daybreak/daybreaklogo.png");
}

[[/module]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

[[include component:image-block
| name=daybreak.jpg
| width=1000px
| caption=A hand-painting with acrylic and spray paint of SCP-001 When Day Breaks
| align=center]]

[[=]]
A large painting I had created in representation of a silhouette survivor making a treacherous journey under the unforgiving sun of the Daybreak canon (and When Day Breaks itself). Yes. I am aware you cannot go outside, the figure is covered in bulky protective clothing.
[[/=]]
